description: Lumber Yard Beard Oil will have you smelling like you spent your day making sawdust - in a good way. We pair together warm cedarwood notes with a subtle layer of sandalwood for a nourishing, woodsy oil that feels light on your beard. Beardbrand premium beard oil is made from a high-quality blend of carrier oils combined with carefully selected ingredients, giving your facial hair a soft texture and a healthy sheen. Regular application will condition your beard while keeping your skin moisturized underneath. Our signature lightweight blend absorbs quickly so it won't leave you feeling greasy to the touch. Apply 3 to 4 drops to your beard and face daily. Re-apply as needed. Keep on growing.
title: Beardbrand™ Lumber Yard Beard Oil - 1 fl oz

bullets: Apply 3 to 4 drops to your beard and face daily
For Use On: Beard and Face
For Hair Type: All Hair Types
Health Concern: Hydrating / Moisturizing, All Natural, Sulfate / Paraben / Silicone Free, Nut Oil Free
Capacity (volume): 1.000oz

bullet_description: For Hair Type: All Hair Types, Fine, Thick, Normal

description: Lumber Yard Beard Softener will have you smelling like you spent your day making sawdust - in a good way. We pair together warm cedarwood notes with a subtle layer of sandalwood for a light, woodsy fragrance. Beardbrand Beard Softener was designed from the ground up specifically for beards, making it the best of its kind. Using beard softener nourishes and conditions your beard so it's softer and more manageable, much like hair conditioner does for your head hair. Like our beard wash, our softener is silicone, paraben, and sulfate free so it won't leave any residue in your beard. For the ultimate experience, apply it after using a matching Beardbrand Beard Wash. Apply softener to beard and rinse. Can be used daily, or as needed. For best results, start with matching beard wash.

description: While a well manicured beard is a symbol of power and prestige, an unruly and disheveled beard has the potential to lead society into complete anarchy. Do your duty and maintain your beard with Duke Cannon's Best Damn Beard Balm. Made with superior grade ingredients like lanolin and cocoa butter, our Beard Balm helps moisturize and protect a man's beard and the face underneath it. With a pleasant, woodsy fragrance, and packaged in a premium travel tin, it's like a portable Redwood forest in your pocket.

Made in the USA and a portion of proceeds benefits US Veterans.

description: There is a fine line between the unruly beard of a grizzled mountain hobo and the dashing beard of a world champion. Go from unkempt to "kempt" with Duke Cannon's Best Damn Beard Oil. Made with premium natural ingredients such as Apricot kernel, argan, and jojoba oils, it's formulated to soften even the hardest working beards. Rich in vitamin e, carotenes, and antioxidants, these oils are considered beneficial against psoriasis, eczema, and acne. At 3X the size of the competition, our Beard Oil will last much longer, and it features an amber apothecary bottle with a slow drip pour top to reduce spills. Features the scent of freshly split cedar, making you feel like you're on a walk through the Redwoods.

description: Magic Beard Balm by Mountaineer Brand is crafted in small batches using a proprietary blend of all natural oils, butters, beeswax and essential oils. Magic Beard Balm is a deep conditioner that, when used daily, supports continued beard health, making it shiny, strokable, and soft. Let your Mountaineer go wild on the inside and enjoy well-groomed, best beard status on the outside. Original Magic Beard Balm is lightly scented with essential oils of Cedar and Fir Needle with a touch of Lime and Grapefruit giving it a clean, fresh scent with a hint of freshly chopped wood. description: We can agree the skin on your face is more sensitive than the skin on your scalp. So why use a shampoo or bar soap, typically made with sulfates, to clean your chin and beard? Sulfates are harsh surfactants that strip your skin and hair of needed moisture. Maestro's Classic™ Beard Wash is here to provide you with a solution for a clean and healthy beard. We prepared a special formula with gentle Sulfate-Free beard and skin conditioning agents to clean your beard and the skin on your chin. A foaming action was added to upgrade its performance and bring you back to a time when cleaning was fun. Formulated with Grapefruit, Black Pepper and Bergamot notes in the fragrance for a classy black tie experience. 8oz.
title: Maestro's Classic Beard Wash Mark of a Man Blend – 8.0 oz
bullet_description: Recommended Skin Type: mature, sensitive, oily, normal, dry, combination

description: Keep your beard clean and give it the care it deserves by treating it to this amazing WV Timber Beard Wash from Mountaineer Brand. Enriched with all-natural ingredients, this nourishing beard wash is lightly scented with essential oils of cedar wood and fir needle that give it a strong and rich aroma, along with a hint of eucalyptus essential oil for a freshened-up finish. It helps reduce the roughness or irritation of your beard while removing residual impurities, leaving you with a well-maintained and healthy-looking beard.
title: Mountaineer Brand™ WV Timber Beard Wash 8 oz

bullets: Moisturizing beard wash makes the perfect addition to your daily grooming routine
Helps retain the original strength and shine of your beard
Lightly scented with essential oils of cedarwood and fir needle for a rich, woodsy aroma

description: An itchy, unruly beard shouldn't have to be the standard. Maestro's Classic™ Beard Butter was created to hydrate and groom a man's mane in a way other beard care products do not. Our hydrating creme is water soluble rather than oil based and succeeds in bringing moisture to the skin on your face and the hair on your chin. The result is an instant soothe and less itchy beardscape. A lightweight product containing multiple conditioning agents will groom, soften and make your beard more manageable. This "Undeniably Good" hydrating cream "Lays it Down" every time. Formulated with Grapefruit, Black Pepper and Bergamot notes in the fragrance for a classy black tie experience. 6oz.
title: Maestro's Classic Beard Butter Mark of a Man Blend – 6.0 oz
bullet_description: Recommended Skin Type: mature, sensitive, oily, normal, dry, combination

description: Magic Beard Balm by Mountaineer Brand is crafted in small batches using a proprietary blend of all natural oils, butters, beeswax and essential oils. Our balm keeps your beard and the skin under your beard conditioned and hydrated, virtually eliminating flaking and itching. Magic Beard Balm is a deep conditioner that, when used daily, supports continued beard health, making it shiny, strokable, and soft. Let your Mountaineer go wild on the inside and enjoy well-groomed, best beard status on the outside. WV Coal Magic Beard Balm brings together a rich blend of essential oils of Clary Sage and Peppermint with a mild touch of Patchouli. This unique combination is a familiar, fresh scent that is part refreshingly bohemian and part bracingly earthy. No heavy perfumes or artificial scents. Our blend of essential oils lend a light aroma that does not cling or linger.
title: Mountaineer Brand™ WV Coal Magic Beard Balm 2 oz

bullets: Promotes healthy growth and helps prevent breakage
Softens coarse hair and keeps rebellious hairs in check
Stops itch, controls dandruff and flakes
Works well with Mountaineer Brand Beard Wash in matching scent
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: Make your beard into a well-oiled machine. Remington® Beard Boss Beard Oil is specially formulated to moisturize, with jojoba oil and vitamin E to soften and condition your beard and the dry, itchy skin beneath. The subtle Timber scent has hints of pine for a manly smell worthy of your manly look.
title: Remington Beard Boss Beard Oil 1 oz

description:
Mountaineer Brand’s Beard Wash is a mild, organic Castile Soap base with a blend of essential oils added for additional conditioning. Regular soaps and shampoos strip your beard of its natural oils, making your beard dry, brittle, and prone to split-ends and breaking. Our Beard Wash not only is mild enough to allow your beard to retain its naturally produced oils, but it also helps hydrate your beard with its proprietary blend of essential oils, fighting off frizz and instead revealing your beard’s natural luster and shine. Mountaineer Brand’s Beard Wash is all-natural, sodium-laurel-sulfate free, gentle enough for daily use for just your beard or even your entire body. This wash comes in a BPA free, shatter-proof plastic bottle with an orifice reducer in the bottle’s opening to allow for controlled dispensing, allowing you to use as much or as little as you’d like without risk of spill.
WV Timber Magic Beard Balm is lightly scented with essential oils of Cedarwood and Fir Needle, giving it a rich, woodsy aroma and is finished off with a touch of Eucalyptus essential oil, lending it a bit of a fresh air feeling. No heavy perfumes or artificial scents. Our blend of essential oils lend a light aroma that does not cling or linger.
Try our Magic Beard Balm in matching scent.
title: Mountaineer Brand™ WV Timber Beard Wash 4 oz
